reviewText: Enjoyed no sex, violence, bad language & fun in these movies.  There is no real reference to why we really have Christmas, but if you want a movie that is safe for family-these work.

reviewText: Holiday in Handcuffs is my favorite of the triple play,but all three are enjoyable to watch ant time of the year.Christmas,snow and comedy all rolled into one dvd,Enjoy.

reviewText: We loved all 3 Christmas Films.  We have watched them numerous times over the Christmas period, and recommend all 3 to add to your collection.
Title: Holiday in Handcuffs / Snow / Snow 2: Brain Freeze

reviewText: We just watched these this weekend.  "Holiday in Handcuffs" is like no other movie I have ever seen.  We laughed so hard in a few places that we had to pause to wipe our eyes.  This is April and it made no difference that these were Christmas themed movies.  The other two movies were outstanding - the acting was terrific!  Nice to have a sequel to a good movie on the same disc too.  SO worth the price and good for watching once a year.  Family movies in good taste.
summary: SO worth the price!  Three FUNNY movies!
Title: Holiday in Handcuffs / Snow / Snow 2: Brain Freeze

reviewText: This one is a great bargain.  I enjoy adding to my Christmas movie collection.  It helps me get in the Christmas spirit.

reviewText: That one was awesome.  I have already watched it several times and enjoy it each time.  Mario Lopez just does not get boring and tiresome.  My opinion.

reviewText: I recently 'cut the cord' when it comes to television and mainly use netflix and hulu thanks to my Roku and Samsung TV (both of which I got from amazon). This is a great little collection of Christmas movies all of which I love. ABC Family creates some fantastic family friendly holiday movies that are for all ages.
Title: Holiday in Handcuffs / Snow / Snow 2: Brain Freeze

reviewText: Holiday in Handcuffs I just love! I find it really comical and has the 'awww' factor in the end. As for the Snow movies, the first one was just ok. Honestly, the 2nd one I couldn't make it thru it! It didn't keep my attention and I tried!
Title: Holiday in Handcuffs / Snow / Snow 2: Brain Freeze

reviewText: Nice to have 3 good family movies on one dvd.Enjoy the holiday movies all year round.Well worth the money.

reviewText: My husband and I watched Holiday in Handcuffs one year on tv, and thought it was funny and cute and the perfect movie to snuggle up on the couch together. We were excited to buy it along with these other two movies, which are also just fun and uplifting. Maybe a little cheesy, but got us in the Christmas spirit.

reviewText: I was very happy to get some of my favorite T.V. Christmas movies, and I plan on getting more. Thank you for the speed of the delivery, I'm very happy.
